title: Rewards Program
subtitle: Configure and manage your customer loyalty system.
rules_desc: Define how your customers earn points. Rules are evaluated when an order is completed.
rewards_desc: Create the catalog of prizes customers can exchange their points for.
tiers_desc: Create loyalty levels based on accumulated points.
delete_reward_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete the reward "{rewardName}".
delete_tier_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete the tier "{tierName}".
delete_rule_confirm_desc: This will permanently delete the rule "{ruleName}".
no_rules_message: No rules created yet. Click "Add Rule" to start.
dialog_reward_desc: Define a redeemable item or benefit for your loyalty program.
dialog_reward_desc_help: A short explanation visible to users in the rewards catalog.
dialog_reward_cost_help: How many loyalty points are required to redeem this reward?
toast_reward_error_desc: Please check your inputs and try again.
dialog_tier_desc: Define a customer loyalty level. Users will unlock this tier once they reach the minimum points.
toast_tier_error_desc: Please try again or contact support.
dialog_rule_desc: Define the conditions and outcomes for this point-earning rule.
dialog_rule_active_desc: If turned off, this rule will not be evaluated.
rule_desc_bonusForAmount: Award a bonus of {points} points if order total is over ${amount}.
rule_desc_fixedPointsPerOrder: Award {points} points for every completed order.
rule_desc_bonusForProduct: Award {points} bonus points if order includes {productName}.
rule_desc_multiplierPerDay: Multiply all earned points by x{multiplier} on {dayName}s.
rule_desc_firstOrderBonus: Award a one-time bonus of {points} points for a client's first order.
rule_desc_anniversaryBonus: Award {points} points on the client's signup anniversary month.
rule_desc_bonusForVariety: Award {points} bonus points if order contains more than {amount} different items.
rule_desc_bonusForCategory: Award {points} bonus points if order includes items from the '{categoryName}' category.
rule_desc_consecutiveBonus: Award {points} bonus points if client orders for {weeks} consecutive weeks.
